app.event(preds, rr, hr)¶

From the prediction we predict the events associated with the signal using rule based conditions. :param preds: Predicitons from ML Model :param rr: rr interval :param hr: heart rate

Returns

event class associated with label.

array

  • sampling_frequency (int) – The Frequecny at which the signal is sampled

app.resample_by_interpolation(signal, input_fs, output_fs)¶

Resamples the SIgnal from current frequency to the requireed frequency :param signal: Input ECG Signal :param input_fs: Current Frequency :param output_fs: Required Frequency

app.standardise(signal, freq, adc)¶

Standardises the Signal to certain frequency and ADC Resolution :param signal: Input ECG Signal :param freq: The Required Frequency :param adc: The Required ADC Resolution

Returns
